title: euw in the shit again?
body:
champ select timer reaches 0 then i get booted to home screen and get an error saying "sorry we were unable to start your game". this happened 3 times in a row so far and i remember 1~ month ago this same shit happened. I swear ever since this client was released bugs that make the game literally unplayable have been more and more frequent

edit: 4x same error
